person.persName: Seldom Fletcher Bowman (Estill County, Kentucky, farmer and captain (U.S.A.))

body.p: Estill County, Kentucky, farmer and soldier (U.S.A.). Kentucky native. Son of Sarah Bowman. Married to Elizabeth Finney Bowman in Madison County, Kentucky, on February 16, 1858. Father of Millard F. Bowman, Isbell Bowman, Susan Bowman. Farmer in Estill County in 1850. Farmer in Estill County in 1860. Served in the 14th Kentucky Volunteer Cavalry (U.S.A.) as captain from August 21, 1862, to September 16, 1863.
